data.name: First Assault - Vast and Infinite Crate
data.detailed_description:
Crate Contents


About the Game

The net is vast and infinite… Dive beyond humanity with Motoko Kusanagi and lead the charge against cyber terrorism with the Vast and Infinite Crate. This crate contains over $130 worth of in-game content, including the Motoko: Signature Skin that’s exclusive to this package! Engage the enemy with these iconic Seburo weapons and the KSG G1, and build up your operative loadouts using the 30-day Section 9 Pass and GP to your advantage.

Vast and Infinite Crate Contents:
  • Motoko: Signature Skin
  • Operative License (x5)
  • Seburo SR
  • Seburo C26-A
  • Seburo C-30
  • KSG G1
  • Section 9 Pass (30 days)
  • 100% XP Booster (x30)
  • 500,000 GP Coupon

Limit 1 Vast and Infinite Crate Per Account. Crates Are Not Transferable.
This Crate is Only Available in Supported Regions.

fullgame.name: Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex - First Assault Online

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Polish, Portuguese-Brazil, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 or higher compatible sound card or on board processor
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit or later
  • Processor: Intel i5 2500 3.3 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 or higher compatible sound card or on board processor
